\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&&& T \\
	{\,} && 0 & E && {\,} \\
	&& S & S \\
	&&& {\,}
	\arrow["{\mathsf{TCofib}}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\mathsf{TCofib}}"', from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\mathsf{Fib}}", from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta }", from=3-4, to=4-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
